# UIForceTouchCapability.unavailable

**Case**

3D Touch isn’t available on the device.

## Declaration

```swift
case unavailable
```

## Availability options

- **UIForceTouchCapability.unknown**: The availability of 3D Touch is unknown.
- **UIForceTouchCapability.available**: 3D Touch is available on the device.

items.description: The availability of 3D Touch is unknown.

items.description: 3D Touch is available on the device.
